Source.name: JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records in F41021 Transaction Workfile (F41021WF)
Source.DisplayName: JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records in F41021 Transaction Workfile (F41021WF)
Source.Description: Orphaned Records in F41021 Transaction Workfile (F41021WF).

DBPattern.SQLQuery: select 'JDE Distribution sensor: Orphaned Records in F41021 Transaction Workfile (F41021WF)' sensor, to_timestamp(to_char(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss'), 'YYYY-MM-DD hh24:mi:ss') entrytime, 'Orphaned_Records_F41021WF:' || s.Orphaned_Records_F41021WF key_data FROM (SELECT COUNT(*) Orphaned_Records_F41021WF FROM CRPDTA.F41021WF WHERE (CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24')) >= 1 AND ((LWUPMJ < (1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD')))) OR (LWUPMJ = (1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD'))) AND (LWTDAY < ((TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24')) -1 ) * 10000 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI')) * 100 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS'))) ) )) THEN 1 WHEN (TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24'))) < 1 AND (LWUPMJ < ((1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD'))) - 1) OR ( (LWUPMJ = (1000*(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'))-1900) + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DDD'))) - 1) AND LWTDAY <= (230000 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MI')) * 60 + TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'SS'))) ) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) = 1 ) s
